Welcome.Subject: Hail to Wyvern, {{username}}!
Welcome.Title: Hail, {{username}}!
Welcome.Body: We’re glad to have thee join the Wyvern kin. Let’s get thee set up!
Welcome.ActionPrompt: To begin thy wandering, please prove thy self:
Welcome.LinkExpiry: This proving link lasts for 30 minutes.
Welcome.Support: Need help? Write us at support@wyvern.gg or look to the rightful Wyvern fellowship.
Welcome.SignOff:
With good will,
— The Wyvern Band

Username.Taken: Sorry, that name is already in use.
Username.TooShort: Name must be at least 2 staves long.
Username.TooLong: Name may not be longer than 15 staves.
Username.InvalidCharacters: Name may only bear letters, numbers, dots, or underlines.
Username.RepeatedSymbols: Name cannot bear back-to-back dots or underlines.

Password.TooShort: Key-word must be at least 8 staves long.
Password.TooLong: Key-word may not be longer than 64 staves.
Password.MissingUpper: Key-word must bear at least one great stave.
Password.MissingLower: Key-word must bear at least one small stave.
Password.MissingDigit: Key-word must bear at least one number.
Password.MissingSpecial: Key-word must bear at least one special mark.

Email.Taken: That e-letter is already in use. Please try another.
Email.TooLong: E-letter may not be longer than 320 staves.
Email.UnresolvableDomain: The e-letter stead '{domain}' seems unright. Try another or reach out for help if thou art sure.

Age.InvalidBirthday: Birth-day cannot be set in the time yet to come.
Age.TooYoung: Thou must be at least 13 winters old to use this craft.
Age.Suspicious: Art thou truly {age} winters old? If so, please reach out — we’ll buy thee a cake!

Register.VerifyEmailRequired: Almost done! Look to thy inbox and prove thy e-letter to end the signup.
Register.UsernameReserved: That name is set aside and cannot be used.
Register.InvalidInvite: The given in-bid code is unright.
Register.InviteOnly: Signup is now by in-bid only. Please give a rightful in-bid code to go on.
